attributes.action: Hold a general election to replace sitting MP's due to the Brexit farce
attributes.additional_details:
Their inability to compromise is a national embarrassment. The way the house of commons is comporting itself is not representative of the electorate irregardless of individual views on Brexit. As the seat of democracy, it is currently not representing the views of the people. I propose..
1) Extend Brexit date a further 2 years
2) call a general election to replace MPs and provide a clear mandate
3) re-engage in Brexit with a clear mandate that MPs have been elected into office to deliver.
attributes.background: The current sitting MPs are unable to compromise and work together to  determine the right course of action for the UK in relation to Brexit.
